Name: Vodkatini / Vodka Martini
Ingredients: 75 ml Ketel One Vodka from freezer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist &/or skewered chilled Fragata Green Olive .
STIR (or shake) all ingredients with ice.
Express lemon zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish &/or adorn with skewered olive.
Review: Temperature is key to the enjoyment of this modern classic. Consume while icy cold, and you'll enjoy a clean and crisp Martini.
History: Exactly where the Vodkatini fits in the vexed question of the origins of the Dry Martini are unknown but it's certain that 'Vodka Martinis' were being served in New York after the repeal of Prohibition in 1933. Its first known print appearance is in a 1935 Smirnoff marketing pamphlet :
Nutrition: One serving of Vodkatini / Vodka Martini contains 174 calories
